title: Achilles and the Houseboy
description: You're invited to take another journey into the world of Houseboy Gillibran Brown. If Achilles, ancient hero of the Trojan War, had worn proper footwear then Gillibran Brown, modern hero of the Domestic Empire, would get into a lot less trouble with his personal gods of hearth and home, or so he'd like to believe. A kiss heralds the arrival of a most unwelcome and troublesome visitor who throws Gilli out of kilter with life and also with his men folk, Dick and Shane.Another entertaining episode in Gillibran Brown's Houseboy series.
author: Gillibran Brown
